name: Dog&Von-Chinese Biggie
description: The story Setting of the game： The opening scene of the game, like many novels, takes place in a grand estate. The owner of the estate is an entrepreneur with a debilitating age. With his sudden admission to the intensive care unit. As time goes on, the question of the future of billions of dollars becomes more and more important. We also found that this family is not so harmonious, the surface of the family seems to be happy. But in fact, there is an undercurrent, as if everyone has other thoughts. Four heirs, plus a dog son, all want to get the legendary billionaire inheritance, they think the older into the intensive care unit will be difficult to get out, but the home cameras have been aimed at them. They need to score as much as possible, there will be preferred by the power of choice, because the family is in accordance with the performance rating, no position here, there are only grades, they need to be in the lobby outside the house (ground or mountain), the sky the three places get score as much as possible, also can let each other get scores as little as possible.  Players need to go through the room of five characters to get the corresponding rewards, each room has a different device, that is, each room has a different way to play.
